title: "Examples"

## Convert between two currencies 

```r
convert_currency(
  amount = 100, 
  from = "CHF",
  to = "EUR", 
  currency_data = currency_data
)
```

## Convert from a reference currency 

```r
head(
  convert_from_reference(
    amount = 100, 
    ref_currency = "CHF",
    currency_data = currency_data
  )
)
```

This returns a table with : 

- reference currency, 
- target currency,
- currency name, 
- converted amount.
